page.description: Classes to read and write Excel documents and example Pages.

item.name: [Office::ExcelDocument Class]
item.description: The Office::ExcelDocument class is the parent class for creation and editing of Excel 2007 documents.

item.name: [Office::Excel2003Document Class]
item.description: The Office::Excel2003Document class is the parent class for creation and editing of Excel 2003 documents.

item.name: [Office::Font Class]
item.description: The Office::Font class contains properties for defining Fonts for formatting text in Excel spreadsheets.

item.name: [Office::Format Class]
item.description: The Office::Format class contains properties for formatting cells in Excel spreadsheets.

item.name: [Office::Spreadsheet Class]
item.description: The Office::Spreadsheet class creates and edits Excel spreadsheets. The spreadsheets can be attached to Office::ExcelDocument or Office::Excel2003Document instances.

description.p: The Office namespace uses several enumerations (integer values with symbolic names) to represent styles and properties, listed below.

item.name: [Office::BorderDiagonal Enumeration]
item.description: Available options for defining a diagonal border for an Office::Format.

item.name: [Office::BorderStyle Enumeration]
item.description: Defines the styles available when defining borders for an Office::Format.

item.name: [Office::CellType Enumeration]
item.description: Data types for a cell in an Office::Spreadsheet.

item.name: [Office::Color Enumeration]
item.description: Available colors for styling fonts, cells, etc in a document.

item.name: [Office::ErrorType Enumeration]
item.description: List of Office error types that can be set in Office::Spreadsheet cells.

item.name: [Office::FillPattern Enumeration]
item.description: Available fill patterns. Used with the Office::Format object.

item.name: [Office::HorizontalAlignment Enumeration]
item.description: Available horizontal alignment options for an Office::Format object.

item.name: [Office::NumericFormat Enumeration]
item.description: Numeric formatting options for cells containing numeric values.

item.name: [Office::Paper Enumeration]
item.description: Available paper sizes for an Excel document.

item.name: [Office::Script Enumeration]
item.description: Defines where the font is rendered relative to the normal line of type.

item.name: [Office::Underline Enumeration]
item.description: Options for defining the underline style for an Office::Font object.

item.name: [Office::VerticalAlignment Enumeration]
item.description: Options for specifying the vertical alignment of the contents for a cell in an Office::Spreadsheet.
